comment: This professor should be a comedian because this class is a joke

Do you like 50 questions worth of work for the low-low price of one? How about teaching yourself all the course material outside of class + homework so you can do busywork all-class-every-class? How about having all your notes from 13 year old 144p quality videos? No? Then don't take this professor so you can actually learn something.
rating_tags: Group projects--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: He is nice, but will make you explain the correct answer in 800 ways for needless complexity. You have to write ALOT, in hw all 10 questions will require about 8 questions worth of writing to explain what the question even is. Its needless work, but he is nice by having a custom grading scheme of basically 85+ on all assignments means an A. meh?
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--So many papers

comment: very smart and knows how to teach, he gives a lot of HW but you're put in a group for the whole class so you can ease the load. 10Q multi choice quiz for you and then for the whole group at the start of each section, these are easy if you red the side he posts. group project for the end of each section 4Q each. final is a project. I learned a lot
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK
